import axios from "axios" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import Navbar from "./Navbar" function Productdetails() { const [products, setproducts] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get("https://fakestoreapi.com/products/1") .then(responce => { console.log(responce) setproducts(responce.data) }) .catch(error => { console.log(error) }) }, []) console.log(products, "lllllllllllllllllll") return ( <>
col 1
col 1

{products?.title}

Description - {products?.description}

Rating - {products?.rating?.rate}

{products?.price}

{/*

Product details .com...

*/} ) } export default Productdetails
